name: environment_scenario_list_all_the_applications_deployed_in_a_specific_c
description: Test case for: As a user, I want to list all the applications deployed in a specific Cyoda environment.

parts.text: list all the applications deployed in a specific Cyoda environment.

Which environment would you like to list applications for? Please provide the env name (e.g., dev, staging, prod). I will check that environment exists and then list its apps.

[options-single-choice: Provide environment name, List my environments]
